const styles = {
  pageContainer: {
    minHeight: '100vh',
    fontFamily: "'Poppins', sans-serif",
    color: '#f0f0f0',
    padding: '2rem',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    backgroundColor: '#014421',
    // verde închis elegant
    backgroundImage: `url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='100' height='100' viewBox='0 0 100 100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Ctext x='10' y='30' font-size='24' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' font-family='Arial, sans-serif'%3E%E2%99%A0%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='60' y='30' font-size='24' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' font-family='Arial, sans-serif'%3E%E2%99%A5%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='10' y='75' font-size='24' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' font-family='Arial, sans-serif'%3E%E2%99%A6%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='60' y='75' font-size='24' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' font-family='Arial, sans-serif'%3E%E2%99%A3%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E")`,
    backgroundRepeat: 'repeat',
    backgroundSize: '100px 100px'
  },
  title: {
    fontWeight: 700,
    fontSize: '3rem',
    marginBottom: '1rem',
    textShadow: '2px 2px 4px #00000099'
  },
  subtitle: {
    fontWeight: 600,
    fontSize: '1.6rem',
    marginBottom: '1rem'
  },
  section: {
    marginBottom: '2rem',
    width: '100%',
    maxWidth: '600px'
  },
  handContainer: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: '1rem'
  },
  card: {
    width: '70px',
    height: '100px',
    borderRadius: '12px',
    backgroundColor: '#ffffffdd',
    boxShadow: '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'space-between',
    padding: '8px',
    color: '#121212',
    fontWeight: 700,
    userSelect: 'none'
  },
  cardValue: {
    fontSize: '1.4rem'
  },
  cardSuit: {
    fontSize: '1.8rem',
    textAlign: 'right'
  },
  hiddenCards: {
    fontStyle: 'italic',
    color: '#bbbbbb'
  },
  buttonsContainer: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: '1rem',
    marginBottom: '2rem'
  },
  buttonHit: {
    padding: '0.8rem 1.6rem',
    fontSize: '1.2rem',
    backgroundColor: '#28a745',
    color: 'white',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '10px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontWeight: '600',
    transition: 'background-color 0.3s ease'
  },
  buttonStand: {
    padding: '0.8rem 1.6rem',
    fontSize: '1.2rem',
    backgroundColor: '#dc3545',
    color: 'white',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '10px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontWeight: '600',
    transition: 'background-color 0.3s ease'
  },
  buttonRestart: {
    padding: '0.8rem 2rem',
    fontSize: '1.3rem',
    backgroundColor: '#ffc107',
    color: '#121212',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '10px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontWeight: '700'
  },
  message: {
    fontSize: '1.5rem',
    fontWeight: 700,
    color: '#fff',
    padding: '1rem',
    backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.6)',
    borderRadius: '12px',
    textAlign: 'center',
    userSelect: 'none',
    boxShadow: '0 0 15px #00ff7f'
  }
};

sourcesContent:
const styles = {
  pageContainer: {
    minHeight: '100vh',
    fontFamily: "'Poppins', sans-serif",
    color: '#f0f0f0',
    padding: '2rem',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column' as const,
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    backgroundColor: '#014421', // verde închis elegant
    backgroundImage: `url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='100' height='100' viewBox='0 0 100 100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Ctext x='10' y='30' font-size='24' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' font-family='Arial, sans-serif'%3E%E2%99%A0%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='60' y='30' font-size='24' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' font-family='Arial, sans-serif'%3E%E2%99%A5%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='10' y='75' font-size='24' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' font-family='Arial, sans-serif'%3E%E2%99%A6%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='60' y='75' font-size='24' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' font-family='Arial, sans-serif'%3E%E2%99%A3%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E")`,
    backgroundRepeat: 'repeat',
    backgroundSize: '100px 100px',
  },
  title: {
    fontWeight: 700,
    fontSize: '3rem',
    marginBottom: '1rem',
    textShadow: '2px 2px 4px #00000099',
  },
  subtitle: {
    fontWeight: 600,
    fontSize: '1.6rem',
    marginBottom: '1rem',
  },
  section: {
    marginBottom: '2rem',
    width: '100%',
    maxWidth: '600px',
  },
  handContainer: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: '1rem',
  },
  card: {
    width: '70px',
    height: '100px',
    borderRadius: '12px',
    backgroundColor: '#ffffffdd',
    boxShadow: '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column' as const,
    justifyContent: 'space-between',
    padding: '8px',
    color: '#121212',
    fontWeight: 700,
    userSelect: 'none',
  },
  cardValue: {
    fontSize: '1.4rem',
  },
  cardSuit: {
    fontSize: '1.8rem',
    textAlign: 'right' as const,
  },
  hiddenCards: {
    fontStyle: 'italic',
    color: '#bbbbbb',
  },
  buttonsContainer: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: '1rem',
    marginBottom: '2rem',
  },
  buttonHit: {
    padding: '0.8rem 1.6rem',
    fontSize: '1.2rem',
    backgroundColor: '#28a745',
    color: 'white',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '10px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontWeight: '600',
    transition: 'background-color 0.3s ease',
  },
  buttonStand: {
    padding: '0.8rem 1.6rem',
    fontSize: '1.2rem',
    backgroundColor: '#dc3545',
    color: 'white',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '10px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontWeight: '600',
    transition: 'background-color 0.3s ease',
  },
  buttonRestart: {
    padding: '0.8rem 2rem',
    fontSize: '1.3rem',
    backgroundColor: '#ffc107',
    color: '#121212',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '10px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontWeight: '700',
  },
  message: {
    fontSize: '1.5rem',
    fontWeight: 700,
    color: '#fff',
    padding: '1rem',
    backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.6)',
    borderRadius: '12px',
    textAlign: 'center' as const,
    userSelect: 'none',
    boxShadow: '0 0 15px #00ff7f',
  },
};
